challenge.input: Hi, I'm Alex Chen. I'm a data scientist at Google.
I'm 32 years old and I live in San Francisco.
I have a PhD in Machine Learning from Stanford. Graduated in 2018.
I've been programming for 10 years, started with Java.
I'm married to someone named Jordan. We have a dog named Max.
I started at Google 3 years ago, right after my PhD.
challenge.expected_conflict: PhD in 2018 + 3 years = 2021, but current year implies different tenure

challenge.input: Wait, I'm actually 34, not 32. I always forget my age.
challenge.expected_conflict: age: 32 vs 34

challenge.input: I've been married for 5 years now. We met at Stanford.
challenge.expected_conflict: If married 5 years and met at Stanford (grad 2018), timeline is tight

challenge.input: Actually I think I said 10 years of programming but it's closer to 12.
challenge.expected_conflict: programming_years: 10 vs 12

challenge.input: I joined Google in 2019. Before that I was at a startup.
challenge.expected_conflict: 2019 join vs '3 years ago' (if different)

challenge.input: I work in the Bay Area, specifically Mountain View.
challenge.expected_conflict: San Francisco vs Mountain View (both Bay Area)

challenge.input: My expertise is in ML and AI systems.
challenge.expected_conflict: Should NOT conflict with 'Machine Learning' - synonyms

challenge.input: I'm a senior ML engineer now, got promoted last month.
challenge.expected_conflict: data scientist vs senior ML engineer

challenge.input: Jordan and I adopted a rescue dog. His name is Max.
challenge.expected_conflict: Should NOT conflict - adding detail to existing fact

challenge.input: I completed my doctorate at Stanford in CS.
challenge.expected_conflict: PhD vs doctorate, ML vs CS - subtle differences

challenge.input: My friend Sarah also works at Google. She's in sales.

challenge.input: I don't actually work at Google anymore. I left last week.
challenge.expected_conflict: employer: Google vs left Google

challenge.input: Wait, that's not right. I'm still at Google, I was confused.
challenge.expected_conflict: left Google vs still at Google

challenge.input: I never said I had a PhD. I have a Master's degree.
challenge.expected_conflict: PhD vs Master's - user denying earlier statement

challenge.input: Actually no, I do have a PhD. I was testing you.

challenge.input: It's not that I don't not work at Google.
